main event: A UFO sighting occurred on April 17, 1966, in Ravenna, Ohio, where Deputy Sheriff Dale Spaur and others reported observing a bright, oblong object hovering and moving at high speeds over a stretch of road.
interesting points: The object emitted a faint humming sound and was described as having a silvery radiance without colored lights,Three deputies chased the object over approximately 86 miles into Pennsylvania, Ranges of speed reported included 105 miles per hour,Local news reported that some photographs of the object had been taken but were not released, The Air Force later suggested that the object observed might have been the planet Venus.
sighted object: oblong shaped UFO with a bright silvery radiance
witness description: Deputy Sheriff Dale Spaur and other deputies from the Ravenna Sheriff's Office, along with several civilians who reported the sighting.
